name: Psychic Fragment Swarm
languages: can repeat one phrase it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The swarm can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Maddening Voices
entries: The swarm constantly emits a babble of words and phrases spoken in life by its many undead spirits. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 ft. of the swarm must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw becomes immune to maddening voices for 24 hours.

traits.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Withering Touch
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (6d6 damage) necrotic damage, or 10 (3d6 damage) necrotic damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
